mosinstall.name: MosModuleMod
mosinstall.author: Chanh Ong
mosinstall.description:
This module loads the mosmodule mambot as a module (requires MosModule 1.2.6).

Support COAddOns in making a small donation!

param.name: align
param.label: Align your module output
param.description: How to align your output in module.

param.name: command
param.label: MosModule command
param.description: Write the command that normally you would write within {mosmodule } mambot tag.
